caption.p: ( aâ€“ c) The female patient aged 54 years old was detected with SARS complicated by pulmonary interstitial fibrosis. On February 20, 2003, the patient had continuous fever, cough without sputum but accompanied with shortness of breath. The patient was hospitalized on March 4, 2003, and cured and discharged on May 15, 2003. On July 21, 2003, CT revealed scattered plaque shadows of increased density, subpleural curvature shadows, and other pulmonary interstitial fibrosis presentations at both lung fields
